      • initializeAllNullOptionalFieldsAsEmpty

        public static <T> T initializeAllNullOptionalFieldsAsEmpty(T obj)
        Searches a given Object hierarchy and sets all null Optional fields to Optional.empty()
        Type Parameters:
        T - the given type of the given Object hierarchy
        Parameters:
        obj - an Object, Array, Iterable or Map
        Returns:
        the given object with all null Optional fields are initialized to Optional.empty()

      • hasOptionalFields

        public static boolean hasOptionalFields(java.lang.Object obj)
        Determines if any Optional fields exist in a given object hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        obj - an Object, Array, Iterable or Map
        Returns:
        true if any Optional fields are found, otherwise false.

      • getOptionalFields

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field>> getOptionalFields(java.lang.Object obj)
        Retrieves any Optional fields in a given object hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        obj - an Object, Array, Iterable or Map
        Returns:
        a Map of optional fields and the object containing the field.
